document_data.mainbody:
Dryfle Doon was a gold dwarf commoner, displaced by The Absolute, and as a refugee, sought shelter in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Dryfle was a gold dwarf with a rosy complexion, light brown hair, and brown eyes. She wore a simple leather armor and a leather circlet.
In the , an army assembled by the Cult of the Absolute moved from the Moonrise Towers in Chionthar Valley to menace the city of Baldurs Gate, displacing countless refugees in the process along the way. Dryfle Doon and brothers Giftu and Hasmet Hudd fled from the Absolutists for over a tenday, and eventually found their way to the city walls and were allowed to enter the Lower City, unlike many other refugees who were refused entrance due to lack of coin or paperwork. Dryfle was impressed with a number of inns in the Lower City, happy to have options and coin to afford lodgings.
